title: Smoking: Pete Ennis doesn't smoke yet
brief_description: Explores the varius pressures and forces which may tend to influence an individual’s decision on whether or not to smoke. Considers the medical aspects of smoking and points out that the longer an individual smokes the harder it is for them to stop. Designed to promote discussion about smoking.
